summary: Implements a back‑ported version of the importlib.metadata API, offering classes and utilities to locate installed Python distributions, read their metadata (such as name, version, requirements, entry points, and associated files), and integrate with the import system via finder objects.
business_intent: Enable version‑agnostic runtime introspection of package metadata so that applications, build tools, and libraries can query installed distributions, resolve dependencies, and load entry points even on Python versions lacking native importlib.metadata support.
